dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Mold release agent; Release coating; Parting agent; Release compound; Demolding agent; Non-stick coating; Separator agent; 客户；脱模剂; 分离剂; N/A for brands
Mold release agent; Release coating; Parting agent; Release compound; Demolding agent; Non-stick coating; Separator agent; 客户；脱模剂; 分离剂; N/A for brands
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The Description for the product flow of a releasing agent encompasses a detailed account of its refinement level and technical characteristics. This includes any treatments applied, adherence to standards, the quality of the product, how it is used, the method of production, and the name of the initial substance (educt). It further clarifies whether the releasing agent is part of a production or consumption mix and indicates where it is available, such as 'to consumer' or 'at plant', with each element outlined distinctly with commas.
释放剂的产品流程描述提供了关于其加工水平和技术特性的详尽而全面的概述。这包括其所接受的处理、符合的标准、产品质量、用途信息、生产路线和初始物质（即原料）的名称。此外，它指定了释放剂是生产还是消费混合的一部分，并指出其可用的地点，例如‘对消费者’或‘在工厂’，并且用逗号分隔所有细节。
